nodes.text: Montrasword was a Rebel captain and First Lieutenant who lived during the Galactic Civil War.

Montrasword appeared as a non-player character in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. Due to the nature of many older quests in Star Wars Galaxies, the appearance of Montrasword changed each time a player performed this quest. Therefore, it is impossible to verify the canonical species of Montrasword. Although Montrasword was identified as Captain Montrasword in the game, examining Montrasword revealed him to also be a Rebel First Lieutenant.
